Package reservation

Class ReservationController

java.lang.Object
reservation.ReservationController
public class ReservationController
extends java.lang.Object
Contains the methods to create, remove and display reservations to the user.
Since:
2021-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jordon

    ReservationController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void checkReservation​(int contactNumber)
    Displays the details of the desired reservation.
    static void createReservationDatabaseFiles()
    Creates a file containing an ArrayList of reservations.
    static void expiredReservations()
    Checks for reservations that has expired for 30 minutes or longer and removes them.
    static void newReservation​(int pax, int contactNumber, java.lang.String datetime)
    Creates a new reservation with at most 30 days in advance and reserves tables accordingly.
    static void removeReservation​(int contactNumber)
    Removes a reservation and vacates that table.

      public ReservationController()

  • Method Details

    • createReservationDatabaseFiles

      public static void createReservationDatabaseFiles()
      Creates a file containing an ArrayList of reservations.

    • expiredReservations

      public static void expiredReservations()
      Checks for reservations that has expired for 30 minutes or longer and removes them.

    • newReservation

      public static void newReservation​(int pax, int contactNumber, java.lang.String datetime) throws FailReadException, FailWriteException, java.text.ParseException
      Creates a new reservation with at most 30 days in advance and reserves tables accordingly.
      Parameters:
      pax - Number of customers of the reservation.
      contactNumber - Contact number of the customer who made the reservation.
      datetime - Date and time of the reservation.
      Throws:
      FailReadException - If the reservation or table files cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the created reservation cannot be written into the reservation file.
      java.text.ParseException - If the date and time cannot be parsed.

    • checkReservation

      public static void checkReservation​(int contactNumber) throws FailReadException, ReservationNotFound
      Displays the details of the desired reservation.
      Parameters:
      contactNumber - Contact number of the customer who made the reservation.
      Throws:
      FailReadException - If the reservation file cannot be read.
      ReservationNotFound - If the reservation does not exist.

    • removeReservation

      public static void removeReservation​(int contactNumber) throws FailReadException, FailWriteException, ReservationNotFound, TableNotFound
      Removes a reservation and vacates that table.
      Parameters:
      contactNumber - Contact number of the customer who made the reservation.
      Throws:
      FailReadException - If the reservation file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the reservation cannot be removed from the reservation file.
      ReservationNotFound - If the reservation does not exist.
      TableNotFound - If the table does not exist.
